content: provided on page 5 with mc and us 7/4 5 mm 24 /60 cm circ next row rs broken out into steps below co 42 50 54 54 sts step 1 k to marker remove marker row 1 ws p2 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end step 2 transfer 30 33 34 36 sleeve sts these row 2 rs k2 *p2 k2 repeat from * to end are all the sts until you reach the next marker onto a holder or piece of scrap yarn threaded repeat row 1-2 until meas approx 1 /2 5 cm through a tapestry needle then remove the next from co edge ending after a row 2 marker next row - raglan set-up row ws p 6 8 8 8 step 3 turn work so ws facing you and using for front pm p 6 7 8 8 for sleeve pm p 18 20 knitted-on co method co 2 sts 22 22 for back pm p 6 7 8 8 for sleeve pm p step 4 then turn work so rs facing you 6 8 8 8 for front again repeat steps 1-4 1 more time then k to end - raglan shaping 82 92 94 98 sts remain on the circ note about stripes in this section you will begin body working the striping pattern starting with the mc work the first 2 row in mc then switch to cc for the starting on a ws row work in st st flat next 2 row work in this fashion until you finish the switching between cc and mc every 2 row as whole body visit my tips page for tutorials on working established until body meas approx 3 5 4 5 5 5 2 row stripes link on page 5 6 /9 11 14 15 cm from underarm or 1 5 /4 cm less than desired underarm to hem length ending switch to us 8/5 mm 24 /60 cm circ after working a ws row with cc row 1 rs *k to 1 st before marker m1-r k1 sm k1 m1-l repeat from * 3 more times then k to end - last row rs broken out by size below 1 st increase d each front 2 sts increase d each sleeve & on back 3 month 12 month & 18 month sizes only row 2 ws p to end slipping markers as you with mc knit to end reach them 6 month size only with mc k1 ssk k to 3 sts repeat row 1-2 11 12 12 13 more times before end k2tog k1 - 2 sts decrease d switching colors every 2 row total sts hem ribbing each front = 18 21 21 22 each sleeve = 30 33 34 36 switch to us 7/4 5 mm 24 /60 cm circ you will back = 42 46 48 50 now only be working with the mc so you can cut the cc yarn row 1 ws p2 *k2 p2 repeat
